report.title: List of locations for mapping
report.description: Basic list of locations designed for mapping.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations l LEFT JOIN locations_websites lw on lw.location_id=l.id and lw.deleted=false JOIN locations lc on lc.parent_id=l.id and lc.deleted=false #joins# WHERE l.deleted=false AND (l.public=true or lw.website_id in (#website_ids#)) #filters#

param.name: location_type_id
param.description: Select the location type, or leave blank to not filter by location type.
